AssociateAssessmentReportEvidenceFolder.name: AssociateAssessmentReportEvidenceFolder
AssociateAssessmentReportEvidenceFolder.documentation: Associates an evidence folder to the specified assessment report in AWS Audit Manager.

BatchAssociateAssessmentReportEvidence.name: BatchAssociateAssessmentReportEvidence
BatchAssociateAssessmentReportEvidence.documentation: Associates a list of evidence to an assessment report in an AWS Audit Manager assessment.

BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment.name: BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment
BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment.documentation: Create a batch of delegations for a specified assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment.name: BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment
BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment.documentation: Deletes the delegations in the specified AWS Audit Manager assessment.

BatchDisassociateAssessmentReportEvidenc.name: BatchDisassociateAssessmentReportEvidence
BatchDisassociateAssessmentReportEvidenc.documentation: Disassociates a list of evidence from the specified assessment report in AWS Audit Manager.

BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl.name: BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl
BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl.documentation: Uploads one or more pieces of evidence to the specified control in the assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

CreateAssessment.name: CreateAssessment
CreateAssessment.documentation: Creates an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

CreateAssessmentFramework.name: CreateAssessmentFramework
CreateAssessmentFramework.documentation: Creates a custom framework in AWS Audit Manager.

CreateAssessmentReport.name: CreateAssessmentReport
CreateAssessmentReport.documentation: Creates an assessment report for the specified assessment.

CreateControl.name: CreateControl
CreateControl.documentation: Creates a new custom control in AWS Audit Manager.

DeleteAssessment.name: DeleteAssessment
DeleteAssessment.documentation: Deletes an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

DeleteAssessmentFramework.name: DeleteAssessmentFramework
DeleteAssessmentFramework.documentation: Deletes a custom framework in AWS Audit Manager.

DeleteAssessmentReport.name: DeleteAssessmentReport
DeleteAssessmentReport.documentation: Deletes an assessment report from an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

DeleteControl.name: DeleteControl
DeleteControl.documentation: Deletes a custom control in AWS Audit Manager.

DeregisterAccount.name: DeregisterAccount
DeregisterAccount.documentation: Deregisters an account in AWS Audit Manager.

DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount.name: DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount
DeregisterOrganizationAdminAccount.documentation: Deregisters the delegated AWS administrator account from the AWS organization.

DisassociateAssessmentReportEvidenceFold.name: DisassociateAssessmentReportEvidenceFolder
DisassociateAssessmentReportEvidenceFold.documentation: Disassociates an evidence folder from the specified assessment report in AWS Audit Manager.

GetAccountStatus.name: GetAccountStatus
GetAccountStatus.documentation: Returns the registration status of an account in AWS Audit Manager.

GetAssessment.name: GetAssessment
GetAssessment.documentation: Returns an assessment from AWS Audit Manager.

GetAssessmentFramework.name: GetAssessmentFramework
GetAssessmentFramework.documentation: Returns a framework from AWS Audit Manager.

GetAssessmentReportUrl.name: GetAssessmentReportUrl
GetAssessmentReportUrl.documentation: Returns the URL of a specified assessment report in AWS Audit Manager.

GetChangeLogs.name: GetChangeLogs
GetChangeLogs.documentation: Returns a list of changelogs from AWS Audit Manager.

GetControl.name: GetControl
GetControl.documentation: Returns a control from AWS Audit Manager.

GetDelegations.name: GetDelegations
GetDelegations.documentation: Returns a list of delegations from an audit owner to a delegate.

GetEvidence.name: GetEvidence
GetEvidence.documentation: Returns evidence from AWS Audit Manager.

GetEvidenceByEvidenceFolder.name: GetEvidenceByEvidenceFolder
GetEvidenceByEvidenceFolder.documentation: Returns all evidence from a specified evidence folder in AWS Audit Manager.

GetEvidenceFolder.name: GetEvidenceFolder
GetEvidenceFolder.documentation: Returns an evidence folder from the specified assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

GetEvidenceFoldersByAssessment.name: GetEvidenceFoldersByAssessment
GetEvidenceFoldersByAssessment.documentation: Returns the evidence folders from a specified assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

GetEvidenceFoldersByAssessmentControl.name: GetEvidenceFoldersByAssessmentControl
GetEvidenceFoldersByAssessmentControl.documentation: Returns a list of evidence folders associated with a specified control of an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

GetOrganizationAdminAccount.name: GetOrganizationAdminAccount
GetOrganizationAdminAccount.documentation: Returns the name of the delegated AWS administrator account for the AWS organization.

GetServicesInScope.name: GetServicesInScope
GetServicesInScope.documentation: Returns a list of the in-scope AWS services for the specified assessment.

GetSettings.name: GetSettings
GetSettings.documentation: Returns the settings for the specified AWS account.

ListAssessmentFrameworks.name: ListAssessmentFrameworks
ListAssessmentFrameworks.documentation: Returns a list of the frameworks available in the AWS Audit Manager framework library.

ListAssessmentReports.name: ListAssessmentReports
ListAssessmentReports.documentation: Returns a list of assessment reports created in AWS Audit Manager.

ListAssessments.name: ListAssessments
ListAssessments.documentation: Returns a list of current and past assessments from AWS Audit Manager.

ListControls.name: ListControls
ListControls.documentation: Returns a list of controls from AWS Audit Manager.

ListKeywordsForDataSource.name: ListKeywordsForDataSource
ListKeywordsForDataSource.documentation: Returns a list of keywords that pre-mapped to the specified control data source.

ListNotifications.name: ListNotifications
ListNotifications.documentation: Returns a list of all AWS Audit Manager notifications.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.documentation: Returns a list of tags for the specified resource in AWS Audit Manager.

RegisterAccount.name: RegisterAccount
RegisterAccount.documentation: Enables AWS Audit Manager for the specified AWS account.

RegisterOrganizationAdminAccount.name: RegisterOrganizationAdminAccount
RegisterOrganizationAdminAccount.documentation: Enables an AWS account within the organization as the delegated administrator for AWS Audit Manager.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.documentation: Tags the specified resource in AWS Audit Manager.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.documentation: Removes a tag from a resource in AWS Audit Manager.

UpdateAssessment.name: UpdateAssessment
UpdateAssessment.documentation: Edits an AWS Audit Manager assessment.

UpdateAssessmentControl.name: UpdateAssessmentControl
UpdateAssessmentControl.documentation: Updates a control within an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

UpdateAssessmentControlSetStatus.name: UpdateAssessmentControlSetStatus
UpdateAssessmentControlSetStatus.documentation: Updates the status of a control set in an AWS Audit Manager assessment.

UpdateAssessmentFramework.name: UpdateAssessmentFramework
UpdateAssessmentFramework.documentation: Updates a custom framework in AWS Audit Manager.

UpdateAssessmentStatus.name: UpdateAssessmentStatus
UpdateAssessmentStatus.documentation: Updates the status of an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

UpdateControl.name: UpdateControl
UpdateControl.documentation: Updates a custom control in AWS Audit Manager.

UpdateSettings.name: UpdateSettings
UpdateSettings.documentation: Updates AWS Audit Manager settings for the current user account.

ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity.name: ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity
ValidateAssessmentReportIntegrity.documentation: Validates the integrity of an assessment report in AWS Audit Manager.

id.documentation: The identifier for the specified AWS account.

emailAddress.documentation: The email address associated with the specified AWS account.

name.documentation: The name of the specified AWS account.

AWSAccount.documentation: The wrapper of AWS account details, such as account ID, email address, and so on.

serviceName.documentation: The name of the AWS service.

AWSService.documentation: An AWS service such as Amazon S3, AWS CloudTrail, and so on.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: Your account is not registered with AWS Audit Manager. Check the delegated administrator setup on the AWS Audit Manager settings page, and try again.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment.

awsAccount.documentation: The AWS account associated with the assessment.

metadata.documentation: The metadata for the specified assessment.

framework.documentation: The framework from which the assessment was created.

tags.documentation: The tags associated with the assessment.

Assessment.documentation: An entity that defines the scope of audit evidence collected by AWS Audit Manager. An AWS Audit Manager assessment is an implementation of an AWS Audit Manager framework.

id.documentation: The identifier for the specified control.

name.documentation: The name of the specified control.

description.documentation: The description of the specified control.

status.documentation: The status of the specified control.

response.documentation: The response of the specified control.

comments.documentation: The list of comments attached to the specified control.

evidenceSources.documentation: The list of data sources for the specified evidence.

evidenceCount.documentation: The amount of evidence generated for the control.

assessmentReportEvidenceCount.documentation: The amount of evidence in the assessment report.

AssessmentControl.documentation: The control entity that represents a standard or custom control used in an AWS Audit Manager assessment.

id.documentation: The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the control set name in a plain string format.

description.documentation: The description for the control set.

status.documentation: Specifies the current status of the control set.

roles.documentation: The roles associated with the control set.

controls.documentation: The list of controls contained with the control set.

delegations.documentation: The delegations associated with the control set.

systemEvidenceCount.documentation: The total number of evidence objects retrieved automatically for the control set.

manualEvidenceCount.documentation: The total number of evidence objects uploaded manually to the control set.

AssessmentControlSet.documentation: Represents a set of controls in an AWS Audit Manager assessment.

name.documentation: The name of the specified evidence folder.

date.documentation: The date when the first evidence was added to the evidence folder.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

controlSetId.documentation: The identifier for the control set.

controlId.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified control.

id.documentation: The identifier for the folder in which evidence is stored.

dataSource.documentation: The AWS service from which the evidence was collected.

author.documentation: The name of the user who created the evidence folder.

totalEvidence.documentation: The total amount of evidence in the evidence folder.

assessmentReportSelectionCount.documentation: The total count of evidence included in the assessment report.

evidenceResourcesIncludedCount.documentation: The amount of evidence included in the evidence folder.

evidenceByTypeConfigurationDataCount.documentation: The number of evidence that falls under the configuration data category. This evidence is collected from configuration snapshots of other AWS services such as Amazon EC2, Amazon S3, or IAM.

evidenceByTypeManualCount.documentation: The number of evidence that falls under the manual category. This evidence is imported manually.

evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckCount.documentation: The number of evidence that falls under the compliance check category. This evidence is collected from AWS Config or AWS Security Hub.

evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckIssuesCount.documentation: The total number of issues that were reported directly from AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, or both.

evidenceByTypeUserActivityCount.documentation: The number of evidence that falls under the user activity category. This evidence is collected from AWS CloudTrail logs.

evidenceAwsServiceSourceCount.documentation: The total number of AWS resources assessed to generate the evidence.

AssessmentEvidenceFolder.documentation: The folder in which AWS Audit Manager stores evidence for an assessment.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the framework.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.

controlSets.documentation: The control sets associated with the framework.

AssessmentFramework.documentation: The file used to structure and automate AWS Audit Manager assessments for a given compliance standard.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the framework.

id.documentation: The unique identified for the specified framework.

type.documentation: The framework type, such as standard or custom.

name.documentation: The name of the specified framework.

description.documentation: The description of the specified framework.

logo.documentation: The logo associated with the framework.

complianceType.documentation: The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.

controlsCount.documentation: The number of controls associated with the specified framework.

controlSetsCount.documentation: The number of control sets associated with the specified framework.

createdAt.documentation: Specifies when the framework was created.

lastUpdatedAt.documentation: Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.

AssessmentFrameworkMetadata.documentation: The metadata associated with a standard or custom framework.

name.documentation: The name of the assessment.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the assessment.

complianceType.documentation: The name of a compliance standard related to the assessment, such as PCI-DSS.

status.documentation: The overall status of the assessment.

assessmentReportsDestination.documentation: The destination in which evidence reports are stored for the specified assessment.

scope.documentation: The wrapper of AWS accounts and services in scope for the assessment.

roles.documentation: The roles associated with the assessment.

delegations.documentation: The delegations associated with the assessment.

creationTime.documentation: Specifies when the assessment was created.

lastUpdated.documentation: The time of the most recent update.

AssessmentMetadata.documentation: The metadata associated with the specified assessment.

name.documentation: The name of the assessment.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the assessment.

complianceType.documentation: The name of the compliance standard related to the assessment, such as PCI-DSS.

status.documentation: The current status of the assessment.

roles.documentation: The roles associated with the assessment.

delegations.documentation: The delegations associated with the assessment.

creationTime.documentation: Specifies when the assessment was created.

lastUpdated.documentation: The time of the most recent update.

AssessmentMetadataItem.documentation: A metadata object associated with an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified assessment report.

name.documentation: The name given to the assessment report.

description.documentation: The description of the specified assessment report.

awsAccountId.documentation: The identifier for the specified AWS account.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

assessmentName.documentation: The name of the associated assessment.

author.documentation: The name of the user who created the assessment report.

status.documentation: The current status of the specified assessment report.

creationTime.documentation: Specifies when the assessment report was created.

AssessmentReport.documentation: A finalized document generated from an AWS Audit Manager assessment. These reports summarize the relevant evidence collected for your audit, and link to the relevant evidence folders which are named and organized according to the controls specified in your assessment.

errorCode.documentation: The error code returned by the AssessmentReportEvidence API.

errorMessage.documentation: The error message returned by the AssessmentReportEvidence API.

AssessmentReportEvidenceError.documentation: An error entity for the AssessmentReportEvidence API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple string message.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the assessment report.

name.documentation: The name of the assessment report.

description.documentation: The description of the specified assessment report.

assessmentId.documentation: The unique identifier for the associated assessment.

author.documentation: The name of the user who created the assessment report.

status.documentation: The current status of the assessment report.

creationTime.documentation: Specifies when the assessment report was created.

AssessmentReportMetadata.documentation: The metadata objects associated with the specified assessment report.

destinationType.documentation: The destination type, such as Amazon S3.

destination.documentation: The destination of the assessment report.

AssessmentReportsDestination.documentation: The location in which AWS Audit Manager saves assessment reports for the given assessment.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

evidenceFolderId.documentation: The identifier for the folder in which evidence is stored.

assessmentId.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified assessment.

evidenceFolderId.documentation: The identifier for the folder in which the evidence is stored.

errors.documentation: A list of errors returned by the BatchAssociateAssessmentReportEvidence API.

createDelegationRequest.documentation: The API request to batch create delegations in AWS Audit Manager.

errorCode.documentation: The error code returned by the BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment API.

errorMessage.documentation: The error message returned by the BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment API.

BatchCreateDelegationByAssessmentError.documentation: An error entity for the BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple string message.

createDelegationRequests.documentation: The API request to batch create delegations in AWS Audit Manager.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

delegations.documentation: The delegations associated with the assessment.

errors.documentation: A list of errors returned by the BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment API.

delegationId.documentation: The identifier for the specified delegation.

errorCode.documentation: The error code returned by the BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment API.

errorMessage.documentation: The error message returned by the BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment API.

BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessmentError.documentation: An error entity for the BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple string message.

delegationIds.documentation: The identifiers for the specified delegations.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

errors.documentation: A list of errors returned by the BatchDeleteDelegationByAssessment API.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

evidenceFolderId.documentation: The identifier for the folder in which evidence is stored.

errors.documentation: A list of errors returned by the BatchDisassociateAssessmentReportEvidence API.

manualEvidence.documentation: Manual evidence that cannot be collected automatically by AWS Audit Manager.

errorCode.documentation: The error code returned by the BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl API.

errorMessage.documentation: The error message returned by the BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl API.

BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControlEr.documentation: An error entity for the BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl API. This is used to provide more meaningful errors than a simple string message.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

controlSetId.documentation: The identifier for the specified control set.

controlId.documentation: The identifier for the specified control.

manualEvidence.documentation: The list of manual evidence objects.

errors.documentation: A list of errors returned by the BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl API.

objectType.documentation: The changelog object type, such as an assessment, control, or control set.

objectName.documentation: The name of the changelog object.

createdAt.documentation: The time of creation for the changelog object.

createdBy.documentation: The IAM user or role that performed the action.

ChangeLog.documentation: The record of a change within AWS Audit Manager, such as a modified assessment, a delegated control set, and so on.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the control.

type.documentation: The type of control, such as custom or standard.

name.documentation: The name of the specified control.

description.documentation: The description of the specified control.

testingInformation.documentation: The steps to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.

actionPlanTitle.documentation: The title of the action plan for remediating the control.

actionPlanInstructions.documentation: The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.

controlSources.documentation: The data source that determines from where AWS Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.

controlMappingSources.documentation: The data mapping sources for the specified control.

createdAt.documentation: Specifies when the control was created.

lastUpdatedAt.documentation: Specifies when the control was most recently updated.

createdBy.documentation: The IAM user or role that created the control.

lastUpdatedBy.documentation: The IAM user or role that most recently updated the control.

tags.documentation: The tags associated with the control.

Control.documentation: A control in AWS Audit Manager.

authorName.documentation: The name of the user who authored the comment.

commentBody.documentation: The body text of a control comment.

postedDate.documentation: The time when the comment was posted.

ControlComment.documentation: A comment posted by a user on a control. This includes the author's name, the comment text, and a timestamp.

sourceId.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified source.

sourceName.documentation: The name of the specified source.

sourceDescription.documentation: The description of the specified source.

sourceSetUpOption.documentation: The setup option for the data source, which reflects if the evidence collection is automated or manual.

sourceType.documentation: Specifies one of the five types of data sources for evidence collection.

sourceFrequency.documentation: The frequency of evidence collection for the specified control mapping source.

troubleshootingText.documentation: The instructions for troubleshooting the specified control.

ControlMappingSource.documentation: The data source that determines from where AWS Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified control.

name.documentation: The name of the specified control.

controlSources.documentation: The data source that determines from where AWS Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.

createdAt.documentation: Specifies when the control was created.

lastUpdatedAt.documentation: Specifies when the control was most recently updated.

ControlMetadata.documentation: The metadata associated with the specified standard or custom control.

id.documentation: The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the control set name in a plain string format.

name.documentation: The name of the control set.

controls.documentation: The list of controls within the control set.

ControlSet.documentation: A set of controls in AWS Audit Manager.

id.documentation: The unique identifier of the control.

CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl.documentation: Control entity attributes that uniquely identify an existing control to be added to a framework in AWS Audit Manager.

name.documentation: The name of the specified control set.

controls.documentation: The list of controls within the control set. This does not contain the control set ID.

CreateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet.documentation: A controlSet entity that represents a collection of controls in AWS Audit Manager. This does not contain the control set ID.

name.documentation: The name of the new custom framework.

description.documentation: An optional description for the new custom framework.

complianceType.documentation: The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.

controlSets.documentation: The control sets to be associated with the framework.

tags.documentation: The tags associated with the framework.

framework.documentation: The name of the new framework returned by the CreateAssessmentFramework API.

name.documentation: The name of the new assessment report.

description.documentation: The description of the assessment report.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

assessmentReport.documentation: The new assessment report returned by the CreateAssessmentReport API.

name.documentation: The name of the assessment to be created.

description.documentation: The optional description of the assessment to be created.

assessmentReportsDestination.documentation: The assessment report storage destination for the specified assessment that is being created.

roles.documentation: The list of roles for the specified assessment.

frameworkId.documentation: The identifier for the specified framework.

tags.documentation: The tags associated with the assessment.

sourceName.documentation: The name of the control mapping data source.

sourceDescription.documentation: The description of the data source that determines from where AWS Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.

sourceSetUpOption.documentation: The setup option for the data source, which reflects if the evidence collection is automated or manual.

sourceType.documentation: Specifies one of the five types of data sources for evidence collection.

sourceFrequency.documentation: The frequency of evidence collection for the specified control mapping source.

troubleshootingText.documentation: The instructions for troubleshooting the specified control.

CreateControlMappingSource.documentation: Control mapping fields that represent the source for evidence collection, along with related parameters and metadata. This does not contain mappingID.

name.documentation: The name of the control.

testingInformation.documentation: The steps to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.

actionPlanTitle.documentation: The title of the action plan for remediating the control.

actionPlanInstructions.documentation: The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.

controlMappingSources.documentation: The data mapping sources for the specified control.

tags.documentation: The tags associated with the control.

control.documentation: The new control returned by the CreateControl API.

comment.documentation: A comment related to the delegation request.

controlSetId.documentation: The unique identifier for the control set.

roleArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

roleType.documentation:
The type of customer persona.

In CreateAssessment, roleType can only be PROCESS_OWNER.

In UpdateSettings, roleType can only be PROCESS_OWNER.

In BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment, roleType can only be RESOURCE_OWNER.

CreateDelegationRequest.documentation: A collection of attributes used to create a delegation for an assessment in AWS Audit Manager.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the delegation.

assessmentName.documentation: The name of the associated assessment.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the associated assessment.

roleArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

roleType.documentation:
The type of customer persona.

In CreateAssessment, roleType can only be PROCESS_OWNER.

In UpdateSettings, roleType can only be PROCESS_OWNER.

In BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment, roleType can only be RESOURCE_OWNER.

creationTime.documentation: Specifies when the delegation was created.

lastUpdated.documentation: Specifies when the delegation was last updated.

controlSetId.documentation: The identifier for the associated control set.

comment.documentation: The comment related to the delegation.

createdBy.documentation: The IAM user or role that created the delegation.

Delegation.documentation: The assignment of a control set to a delegate for review.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the delegation.

assessmentName.documentation: The name of the associated assessment.

assessmentId.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified assessment.

status.documentation: The current status of the delgation.

roleArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

creationTime.documentation: Specifies when the delegation was created.

controlSetName.documentation: Specifies the name of the control set delegated for review.

DelegationMetadata.documentation: The metadata associated with the specified delegation.

frameworkId.documentation: The identifier for the specified framework.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

assessmentReportId.documentation: The unique identifier for the assessment report.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

controlId.documentation: The identifier for the specified control.

status.documentation: The registration status of the account.

adminAccountId.documentation: The identifier for the specified administrator account.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

evidenceFolderId.documentation: The identifier for the folder in which evidence is stored.

dataSource.documentation: The data source from which the specified evidence was collected.

evidenceAwsAccountId.documentation: The identifier for the specified AWS account.

time.documentation: The timestamp that represents when the evidence was collected.

eventSource.documentation: The AWS service from which the evidence is collected.

eventName.documentation: The name of the specified evidence event.

resourcesIncluded.documentation: The list of resources assessed to generate the evidence.

attributes.documentation: The names and values used by the evidence event, including an attribute name (such as allowUsersToChangePassword) and value (such as true or false).

iamId.documentation: The unique identifier for the IAM user or role associated with the evidence.

complianceCheck.documentation: The evaluation status for evidence that falls under the compliance check category. For evidence collected from AWS Security Hub, a Pass or Fail result is shown. For evidence collected from AWS Config, a Compliant or Noncompliant result is shown.

awsOrganization.documentation: The AWS account from which the evidence is collected, and its AWS organization path.

awsAccountId.documentation: The identifier for the specified AWS account.

evidenceFolderId.documentation: The identifier for the folder in which the evidence is stored.

id.documentation: The identifier for the evidence.

assessmentReportSelection.documentation: Specifies whether the evidence is inclded in the assessment report.

Evidence.documentation: A record that contains the information needed to demonstrate compliance with the requirements specified by a control. Examples of evidence include change activity triggered by a user, or a system configuration snapshot.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified framework.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified framework.

name.documentation: The name of the specified framework.

type.documentation: The framework type, such as custom or standard.

complianceType.documentation: The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.

description.documentation: The description of the specified framework.

logo.documentation: The logo associated with the framework.

controlSources.documentation: The sources from which AWS Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.

controlSets.documentation: The control sets associated with the framework.

createdAt.documentation: Specifies when the framework was created.

lastUpdatedAt.documentation: Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.

createdBy.documentation: The IAM user or role that created the framework.

lastUpdatedBy.documentation: The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.

tags.documentation: The tags associated with the framework.

Framework.documentation: The file used to structure and automate AWS Audit Manager assessments for a given compliance standard.

name.documentation: The name of the framework.

logo.documentation: The logo associated with the framework.

complianceType.documentation: The compliance standard associated with the framework, such as PCI-DSS or HIPAA.

FrameworkMetadata.documentation: The metadata of a framework, such as the name, ID, description, and so on.

status.documentation: The status of the specified AWS account.

frameworkId.documentation: The identifier for the specified framework.

framework.documentation: The framework returned by the GetAssessmentFramework API.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

s3ResourcePath.documentation: The Amazon S3 URL that points to a manual evidence object.

ManualEvidence.documentation: Evidence that is uploaded to AWS Audit Manager manually.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the notification.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

assessmentName.documentation: The name of the related assessment.

controlSetId.documentation: The identifier for the specified control set.

controlSetName.documentation: Specifies the name of the control set that the notification is about.

eventTime.documentation: The time when the notification was sent.

Notification.documentation: The notification used to inform a user of an update in AWS Audit Manager. For example, this includes the notification that is sent when a control set is delegated for review.

delegatedAdminAccount.documentation: The delegated administrator account for AWS Audit Manager.

status.documentation: The status of the account registration request.

adminAccountId.documentation: The identifier for the specified delegated administrator account.
The identifier for the specified delegated administrator account.

organizationId.documentation: The identifier for the specified AWS organization.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the specified resource.

value.documentation: The value of the specified resource.

Resource.documentation: A system asset that is evaluated in an AWS Audit Manager assessment.

resourceId.documentation: The unique identifier for the specified resource.

resourceType.documentation: The type of resource affected by the error.

ResourceNotFoundException.documentation: The resource specified in the request cannot be found.

roleType.documentation:
The type of customer persona.

In CreateAssessment, roleType can only be PROCESS_OWNER.

In UpdateSettings, roleType can only be PROCESS_OWNER.

In BatchCreateDelegationByAssessment, roleType can only be RESOURCE_OWNER.

roleArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

Role.documentation: The wrapper that contains the AWS Audit Manager role information of the current user, such as the role type and IAM Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

awsAccounts.documentation: The AWS accounts included in the scope of the assessment.

awsServices.documentation: The AWS services included in the scope of the assessment.

Scope.documentation: The wrapper that contains the AWS accounts and AWS services in scope for the assessment.

name.documentation: The name of the AWS service.

displayName.documentation: The display name of the AWS service.

description.documentation: The description of the specified AWS service.

category.documentation: The category in which the AWS service belongs, such as compute, storage, database, and so on.

ServiceMetadata.documentation: The metadata associated with the specified AWS service.

isAwsOrgEnabled.documentation: Specifies whether AWS Organizations is enabled.

snsTopic.documentation: The designated Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.

defaultAssessmentReportsDestination.documentation: The default storage destination for assessment reports.

Settings.documentation: The settings object that holds all supported AWS Audit Manager settings.

keywordInputType.documentation: The method of input for the specified keyword.

keywordValue.documentation: The value of the keyword used to search AWS CloudTrail logs, AWS Config rules, AWS Security Hub checks, and AWS API names when mapping a control data source.

SourceKeyword.documentation: The keyword to search for in AWS CloudTrail logs, AWS Config rules, AWS Security Hub checks, and AWS API names.

resourceArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified resource.

tags.documentation: The tags to be associated with the resource.

hyperlinkName.documentation: The name or word used as a hyperlink to the URL.

link.documentation: The unique identifier for the internet resource.

URL.documentation: A uniform resource locator, used as a unique identifier to locate a resource on the internet.

resourceArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified resource.

tagKeys.documentation: The name or key of the tag.

controlId.documentation: The identifier for the specified control.

controlStatus.documentation: The status of the specified control.

commentBody.documentation: The comment body text for the specified control.

control.documentation: The name of the updated control set returned by the UpdateAssessmentControl API.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

controlSetId.documentation: The identifier for the specified control set.

status.documentation: The status of the control set that is being updated.

comment.documentation: The comment related to the status update.

controlSet.documentation: The name of the updated control set returned by the UpdateAssessmentControlSetStatus API.

id.documentation: The unique identifier for the control set.

name.documentation: The name of the control set.

controls.documentation: The list of controls contained within the control set.

UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet.documentation: A controlSet entity that represents a collection of controls in AWS Audit Manager. This does not contain the control set ID.

frameworkId.documentation: The identifier for the specified framework.

name.documentation: The name of the framework to be updated.

description.documentation: The description of the framework that is to be updated.

complianceType.documentation: The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.

controlSets.documentation: The control sets associated with the framework.

framework.documentation: The name of the specified framework.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

assessmentName.documentation: The name of the specified assessment to be updated.

assessmentDescription.documentation: The description of the specified assessment.

scope.documentation: The scope of the specified assessment.

assessmentReportsDestination.documentation: The assessment report storage destination for the specified assessment that is being updated.

roles.documentation: The list of roles for the specified assessment.

assessment.documentation: The response object (name of the updated assessment) for the UpdateAssessmentRequest API.

assessmentId.documentation: The identifier for the specified assessment.

status.documentation: The current status of the specified assessment.

assessment.documentation: The name of the updated assessment returned by the UpdateAssessmentStatus API.

controlId.documentation: The identifier for the specified control.

name.documentation: The name of the control to be updated.

description.documentation: The optional description of the control.

testingInformation.documentation: The steps that to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.

actionPlanTitle.documentation: The title of the action plan for remediating the control.

actionPlanInstructions.documentation: The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.

controlMappingSources.documentation: The data mapping sources for the specified control.

control.documentation: The name of the updated control set returned by the UpdateControl API.

snsTopic.documentation: The Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic to which AWS Audit Manager sends notifications.

defaultAssessmentReportsDestination.documentation: The default storage destination for assessment reports.

defaultProcessOwners.documentation: A list of the default audit owners.

s3RelativePath.documentation: The relative path of the specified Amazon S3 bucket in which the assessment report is stored.

signatureValid.documentation: Specifies whether the signature key is valid.

signatureAlgorithm.documentation: The signature algorithm used to code sign the assessment report file.

signatureDateTime.documentation: The date and time signature that specifies when the assessment report was created.

signatureKeyId.documentation: The unique identifier for the validation signature key.

validationErrors.documentation: Represents any errors that occurred when validating the assessment report.

reason.documentation: The reason the request failed validation.

fields.documentation: The fields that caused the error, if applicable.

ValidationException.documentation: The request has invalid or missing parameters.

name.documentation: The name of the validation error.

message.documentation: The body of the error message.

ValidationExceptionField.documentation: Indicates that the request has invalid or missing parameters for the specified field.

documentation:
Welcome to the AWS Audit Manager API reference. This guide is for developers who need detailed information about the AWS Audit Manager API operations, data types, and errors.

AWS Audit Manager is a service that provides automated evidence collection so that you can continuously audit your AWS usage, and assess the effectiveness of your controls to better manage risk and simplify compliance.

AWS Audit Manager provides pre-built frameworks that structure and automate assessments for a given compliance standard. Frameworks include a pre-built collection of controls with descriptions and testing procedures, which are grouped according to the requirements of the specified compliance standard or regulation. You can also customize frameworks and controls to support internal audits with unique requirements.

Use the following links to get started with the AWS Audit Manager API:

  • Actions: An alphabetical list of all AWS Audit Manager API operations.

  • Data types: An alphabetical list of all AWS Audit Manager data types.

  • Common parameters: Parameters that all Query operations can use.

  • Common errors: Client and server errors that all operations can return.

If you're new to AWS Audit Manager, we recommend that you review the AWS Audit Manager User Guide.
